021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.TNECallbackProvider;
024import net.tnemc.core.io.message.BaseTranslationProvider;
025import net.tnemc.menu.sponge8.Sponge8MenuHandler;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.api.CallbackManager;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.sponge.SpongePluginCore;
029import net.tnemc.sponge.command.AdminCommand;
030import net.tnemc.sponge.command.ModuleCommand;
031import net.tnemc.sponge.command.MoneyCommand;
032import net.tnemc.sponge.command.ShortCommands;
033import net.tnemc.sponge.command.TransactionCommand;
034import net.tnemc.sponge.impl.SpongeEconomy;
035import net.tnemc.sponge.impl.SpongeItemCalculations;
036import net.tnemc.sponge.listeners.player.PlayerCloseInventoryListener;
037import net.tnemc.sponge.listeners.player.PlayerJoinListener;
038import net.tnemc.sponge.listeners.player.PlayerLeaveListener;
039import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
040import org.bstats.sponge.Metrics;
041import org.spongepowered.api.ResourceKey;
042import org.spongepowered.api.Server;
043import org.spongepowered.api.Sponge;
044import org.spongepowered.api.config.ConfigDir;
045import org.spongepowered.api.event.Listener;
046import org.spongepowered.api.event.lifecycle.ConstructPluginEvent;
047import org.spongepowered.api.event.lifecycle.ProvideServiceEvent;
048import org.spongepowered.api.event.lifecycle.StartedEngineEvent;
049import org.spongepowered.api.event.lifecycle.StartingEngineEvent;
050import org.spongepowered.api.event.lifecycle.StoppingEngineEvent;
051import org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.EconomyService;
052import org.spongepowered.api.util.metric.MetricsConfigManager;
053import org.spongepowered.plugin.PluginContainer;
054import org.spongepowered.plugin.builtin.jvm.Plugin;
055import revxrsal.commands.command.CommandActor;
056import revxrsal.commands.command.ExecutableCommand;
057import revxrsal.commands.sponge.SpongeLamp;
058
059import java.nio.file.Path;
060
061/**
062 * The Sponge main plugin class.
063 *
064 * @author creatorfromhell
065 * @since 0.1.2.0
066 */
067
068@Plugin("tne")
069public class SpongeCore extends TNECore {
070
071  protected final SpongePluginCore pluginCore;
072  protected final PluginContainer container;
073  private final Metrics metrics;
074  @Inject
075  @ConfigDir(sharedRoot = false)
076  private Path configDir;
077
078  @Inject
079  private MetricsConfigManager metricsConfigManager;
080
081  @Inject
082  SpongeCore(final PluginContainer container, final Logger log, final Metrics.Factory metricsFactory) {
083
084    this.pluginCore = new SpongePluginCore(container, this, log, new BaseTranslationProvider(), new TNECallbackProvider());
085    this.container = container;
086
087    command = SpongeLamp.builder(container).accept(registerParameters()).build();
088
089    metrics = metricsFactory.make(19246);
090  }
091
092  @Override
093  public void registerMenuHandler() {
094
095    this.menuHandler = new Sponge8MenuHandler(container, true);
096  }
097
098
099  @Listener
100  public void onConstruct(final ConstructPluginEvent event) {
101
102    if(hasConsent()) {
103      metrics.startup(event);
104    }
105  }
106
107  @Listener
108  public void onEngineStart(final StartingEngineEvent<Server> event) {
109
110    PluginCore.log().inform("Starting up The New Economy.");
111
112    //Register our event listeners
113    Sponge.eventManager().registerListeners(container, new PlayerJoinListener(container, event.engine().boundAddress().get()));
114    Sponge.eventManager().registerListeners(container, new PlayerLeaveListener(container));
115    Sponge.eventManager().registerListeners(container, new PlayerCloseInventoryListener(container));
116  }
117
118  @Listener
119  public void onServerStart(final StartedEngineEvent<Server> event) {
120    //this.directory = configDir.toFile();
121    pluginCore.enable();
122    PluginCore.log().inform("The New Economy has been enabled.");
123  }
124
125  @Listener
126  public void onServerStop(final StoppingEngineEvent<Server> event) {
127
128    pluginCore.onDisable();
129    PluginCore.log().inform("The New Economy has been disabled.");
130  }
131
132  @Listener
133  public void provideEconomy(final ProvideServiceEvent.EngineScoped<EconomyService> event) {
134
135    event.suggest(SpongeEconomy::new);
136  }
137
138  public PluginContainer getContainer() {
139
140    return container;
141  }
142
143  @Override
144  public void registerCommandHandler() {
145
146    command = SpongeLamp.builder(container).accept(registerParameters()).build();
147  }
148
149  @Override
150  public String commandHelpWriter(final ExecutableCommand executableCommand, final CommandActor commandActor) {
151
152    return "";
153  }
154
155  @Override
156  public void registerCommands() {
157
158    super.registerCommands();
159
160    command.register(new AdminCommand());
161    command.register(new ModuleCommand());
162    command.register(new MoneyCommand());
163    command.register(new ShortCommands());
164    command.register(new TransactionCommand());
165  }
166
167  @Override
168  public void registerConfigs() {
169
170  }
171
172  @Override
173  public void registerCallbacks(final CallbackManager callbackManager) {
174
175    super.registerCallbacks(callbackManager);
176    //nothing to see here.
177  }
178
179  @Override
180  public SpongeItemCalculations itemCalculations() {
181
182    return new SpongeItemCalculations();
183  }
184
185  public boolean hasConsent() {
186
187    return this.metricsConfigManager.collectionState(this.container).asBoolean();
188  }
189
190  public static ResourceKey key(final String key) {
191
192    final String[] split = key.split(":");
193
194    final String namespace = (split.length >= 2)? split[0] : "minecraft";
195    final String value = (split.length >= 2)? split[1] : split[0];
196    return ResourceKey.of(namespace, value);
197  }
198}
